functions.title: BOE Vol 13
pages:
§lSmite I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of rotten flesh as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lSmite II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a bone as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
 R §r

§lSmite III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a stone sword as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top  (L).
§lLLL
 B 
 R §r

§lSmite IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a ghast tear as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top and on the left (L).
§lLLL
LB 
 R §r

§lSmite V:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a wither skeleton skull as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a a row of lapis along the top and on both sides (L).
§lLLL
LBL
 R §r
